mapper.select: SELECT c.lecture_year as lectureYear, c.curriculum_semester as curriculumSemester, c.curriculum_division as curriculumDivision, c.lecture_week as lectureWeek, c.start_date as startDate, c.end_date as endDate, clw.makeup_week as makeupWeek FROM JOIN lecture_info as li, curriculum_subject as cs, curriculum as c, curriculum_lecture_week as clw
